tddt.catalog.exercisechooser

Class ExerciseChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • tddt.catalog.exercisechooser.ExerciseChooser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ExerciseChooser
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class opens a new window which allows the user to load catalogs and choose exercises out of those catalogs.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kai Holzinger

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      The choosebutton is initialized as a disabled button.
      void onBtnChooseClicked()
      Close catalog chooser if user clicks on the 'Choose' button.
      void onBtnCloseClicked()
      Set the return values to null and close the stage if user clicks on cancel button
      void onExerciseClicked()
      If the user clicks on an exercise in the ListView some information about the exercise is shown on the right and the choose button becomes enabled.
      void onOpenClicked()
      Open a FileChooser dialog if user clicks on open in the file menu.

      Create and show catalog chooser stage.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExerciseChooser

        public ExerciseChooser()

    • Method Detail

      • onOpenClicked

        public void onOpenClicked()
        Open a FileChooser dialog if user clicks on open in the file menu. If user chooses a file which is not a catalog file an exception prompt pops up. If catalog is successfully loaded, the ListView will show all contained exercises.

      • onExerciseClicked

        public void onExerciseClicked()
        If the user clicks on an exercise in the ListView some information about the exercise is shown on the right and the choose button becomes enabled.

      • onBtnChooseClicked

        public void onBtnChooseClicked()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Close catalog chooser if user clicks on the 'Choose' button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • onBtnCloseClicked

        public void onBtnCloseClicked()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Set the return values to null and close the stage if user clicks on cancel button
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • showStage

        public java.lang.String[] showStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Create and show catalog chooser stage. Returns catalog path and exercise number to the main app.
        Parameters:
        stage - The owner (Main) window
        Returns:
        A String Array which contains the XML-Catalog-File and the index of the chosen exercise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        The choosebutton is initialized as a disabled button.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        See Also:
        for enable setting
